## Commands

### Test

```
devtools::test()
```
or CTRL+SHIFT+T in RStudio


### Load package 

```
devtools::load_all(".")
```
or CTRL+SHIFT+L in RStudio

### Build

```
devtools::build()
```

### Documentation

```
 devtools::document()
```
or CTRL+SHIFT+D in RStudio

### To reload R 

CTRL+SHIFT+F10 in RStudio
